name: ESTATE OF Blanche W. STARR, a/k/a Blanche Starr, Deceased. Appeal of Brice DALRYMPLE

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Blanche W. STARR, a/k/a Blanche Starr, Deceased. Appeal of Brice DALRYMPLE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Raymond J. Quaglia, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John H. Potts, Wayne, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1017
ESTATE OF Blanche W. STARR, a/k/a Blanche Starr, Deceased. Appeal of Brice DALRYMPLE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Raymond J. Quaglia, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John H. Potts, Wayne, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
